Warband.Name: Blackwatch of Sigfreidhof
Warband.Hook: Army unit of mistrustful vampire hunters
Warband.Active: Usually only battlegrounds nights (last week of each month)
Warband.Location: Sigfriedhof, in Stirland, an Empire province
Warband.Description: Hailing from the small town of Siegfriedhof in Stirland, this band of faithful members of the Fellowship of the Shroud are dedicated to the eradication of undead, especially Vampires. They have traveled to the Border Princes to track down their enemy - it is believed there is a vampire among the people of Helsreik. They will do their utmost to find the monster and destroy it.
